review_text: Robert and Laurel have the best mountain retreat! The cottage is as every bit as cozy as it appears in the pictures. It is not advertised as a hikers paradise but it is! I spent the week hiking Kings and Crowder's mountains and this was such a a great spot to begin and end my days in. There are several grocery options both north and south of the cottage that offer pick up which is fantastic after a long day on the trails. I will definitely be back. Thank you both!
Excellent hosts! Home was beautiful and just as described. Hosts were responsive and very friendly. This home was perfect for my couple week stay! Thank you so much. I highly recommend!
This was a wonderful home in a private location. The back deck was wonderful for dinner and the home was comfortable. A great stay!

I would highly recommend this Airbnb if you are staying in the area. Robert's place was very comfortable and had everything you could ask for. It was reasonably priced and set in a serene country setting. It's a perfect location to relax and rejuvenate. Robert was extremely efficient and responsive in all communication. We made some wonderful family memories.
We absolutely loved this home. First place that we felt “at home” in an Airbnb. Everything was so cozy and accommodating for our needs. We will definitely want to stay again, our next trip out!

We will go back.

Super cute place! Felt right at home! It was super convenient how close to the Iron City Race Track it was making the drive worth it! Better than any hotel we would've stayed at!!

Robert's home is a beauty in the country. Huge front/side yard. As we walked in, it was very clean and wonderfully decorated. It smelled of fresh linens and looks exactly like the photos. Very cozy. He provided everything we needed for the kitchen so that was a huge plus for us. Each bedroom had its own theme which made it feel more homey. Also, I liked that they offered different pillows of soft, firm, and cooling gels. Being from the country, I loved it had a nice seating area outside on the back deck. I enjoyed how peaceful it was to drink my coffee and watch the cardinals from there. There is a grocery store about 4 miles from the home. Our commute was to Gastonia and was only about a 30 to 40 minute drive. We would definitely recommend Robert's home. Robert is an excellent host. Very responsive and friendly. We had a storm come through and he checked on us and told us where to find a lantern if needed. 5 star stay!! Thank you again!!
Robert’s place was tucked in and cozy, and very nice inside. Robert provided easy to understand instructions and was a pleasure to communicate with.

Robert is a gracious and caring host. He made everything extremely easy and accommodating when I arrived. His communication was timely and accurate. And he was extremely responsive to all of my questions. The home is an oasis in a rural area, with beautiful plants and landscaping all around the house. Would highly recommend the home and Robert to any guests who are looking for a quiet “country” stay. Thank you, Robert.

Robert and his family were amazing host's and the cabin was amazing with so many homely touches me and my family felt so very welcomed. There was plenty of wild life to see and hear and they had a beautiful blooming garden quite close that was so wonderful to watch grow and change everyday. I would recommend this to all my family and friends and anyone giving this a read. It is definitely worth the stay!

This is my second stay at Roberts play and I must say it was great like the first. Very clean, comfortable, friendly quit and relaxing place. Looking forward to staying again if the opportunity arises.

Roberts place is an awesome place to unwind and relax. If you like the peace and quite of the country. look no further, this is it. The place was very clean, comfortable and homey. It was very well decorated supplied and comfortable. I recommend it and will stay again when the opportunity comes.

This home is BEAUTIFUL! The photos don’t do it JUSTICE! I am a country girl at heart & I love love love the country and the scenery which is what attracted me to this lovely home. This home is EVERYTHING! It is secluded, quiet, & finding this location was not hard at all! And if you’re from the country you know the country is prone to having “ country bugs ” listen to me, I didn’t see ONE BUG! Not a fly or anything & I loved that as well! My family and I drove in from Texas & upon entering this home we felt as if we never left Texas. We had everything we needed and even things we didn’t realize we needed! Robert even checked in on us personally & I loved that because it is very seldom that I actually meet the host in person. 5 stars just isn’t enough for this stay! This home needs 10! You will not be disappointed!! If you need a place to get away and reflect, this is the place for you!

Stayed here with my family about a month while waiting to close on a house. Nice quiet location, and the house has all the modern comforts you'd expect. The owner was very responsive and helpful. Very family friendly. Great stay overall!
Excellent service and neatness
It was a nice stay...peaceful. We cooked out on the provided gas grill. The view of the river is very calming. The kitchen was stocked nicely. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you!!

This place was great! It was very clean and private. The instructional videos were very helpful. The host (Jeff) was super responsive and patient. I hope to book this place again when I visit family in the area.
Was a great stay and I will be going back. I had to leave in a hurry due to some family stuff but would have booked longer if I could.
The place was just as listed on the site it’s beautiful the surrounding is peaceful everything worked out great I would definitely be booking again in the future
We absolutely loved our stay here and they were super responsive and easy to communicate with.

This is a great place to get away in quite the remote location. I did not get to spend as much time as I had hoped on the porch just watching the river go by, spending most of my time away. Just know that it is definitely remote, so driving in at night can be a bit of an adventure. Getting into the door was relatively easy, though a little tricky opening both locks. I felt secure in the setting.
Absolutely loved this trip here. So peaceful and quiet, no one bothered us. definitely will be going back here again. Highly recommend this spot.

My son and i had a great time and stay at Watson's place. i like that it was on a river and was very peaceful. only downfall was it was just a bit tucked in the land and was a 15 min plus drive to get food and supplies. location distance between Charlotte and Asheville was what i was looking for just wish amenities were a little closer and more option. The place was perfect for me and my son and was the type of getaway i was looking for me and him. the set up of the RV was very nice. had a nice rustic feel and a nice deck that was created for the place. I would say a slight downfall would be that there was not any wifi, but i think that help my son and i find more things to do together and bond more. so i would not give that a negative mark.

we loved this place! The view of the river was amazing and the area was very quiet, almost as if time has stopped. We found great hiking near by and a surprising number of good places to eat. We'll definitely be back!
great place to stay for the weekend!
Very quiet and reserved, nice neighbors overall great stay!
Was a great last minute stay will return!
Absolutely perfect! Plenty of room for two (much larger than you'd expect for an RV), on a lovely piece of property. Ideal for a getaway or home base for exploring. I'd go back in a heartbeat!

We loved this place for our two day get away. Location was very private and quiet. Home was extremely clean and everything we needed was provided. Host was great communicator. Due to cold weather, we did not take advantage of the welcoming front porch that overlooked the river, but plan to do so when we return. Kitchen was stocked with essentials including coffee pods. Seating in living area was comfortable. Fireplace in bedroom provided great ambiance. We brought several DVDs and enjoyed the surround sound system. updated pull down u blinds throughout provided all the privacy you could want. Pictures on listing are great representation of the home. Thanks to host for a secluded unique retreat!
Nice quiet spot for the week. Looking forward to checking it out again in the spring.
Great place and location. Will definitely book again.

This place is awesome! The pictures did not do it justice. It is very clean, well maintained and is in a beautiful location. It is warm and cozy and felt like home. I loved the front porch! It is so relaxing to sit and watch the river and listen to its rippling water. Watson is a wonderful host. Very responsive to massages and even sent videos with instructions on how to work everything like the thermostat, gas stove etc. We enjoyed every minute of our stay and will definitely be back. Well worth the money!

With 3 hours between her scheduled events we were close enough to pop back to the camper for lunch and relax awhile. It looks like there may be a seasonal Kayak rental 2 doors down to the left. The public access to the river near the kayak rental was used by a Kayak according to tracks left in mud. Access is overgrown. Bring a grill tank with fuel if expecting to grill. Or bring charcoal - there was a small charcoal grill.
